content.rendered:
beauty bar in barrhaven | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in barrhaven, ottawa. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in barrhaven | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 3171 strandherd dr, nepean 205A. k2j 5n1 barrhaven, ottawa
  • 613-825-9009
  • barrhaven@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Had a regular manicure done with Ashley at the Barrhaven location. Ashley was very personable and did a great job cleaning up and filing my nails. Just what I needed.
Toni C.
1721853448
I had an amazing gel mani and pedi with Olena! She was meticulous, professional, and super sweet. My nails have never looked better and the whole experience was so nice. Highly recommend Olena and The Ten Spot in Barrhaven.
Tiffany F.
1719785591
Friendly and quick service. They will offer you a drink like water, bubbly. No massage chairs unfortunately! Did a great job on the pedicure.
Emilie G.
1716768024
BEFORE AND AFTER PICS... the one of me closing my eyes is Tina's magic results...Tina SAVEEDDD my brows... My brows were really bushy and uneven & she made sure to grasp what I was looking for with my inspo pics.. She's so bubbly and uplifting &... she took her time to make sure I was happy with the end result. She does MAGIC I tell u! 💕💕💕read more
Khadeeja R.
1715369580
Manicure and pedicure services are great! The staff is really nice, polite, friendly and patient. I've done both regular mani and gel mani and was happy. The cuticle work is great and you leave there feeling clean and pampered. They are also great... with kids and teens. AAAANNNDDDD, the coffee is great too! Love it!read more
Daniela S.
1712789673
‹
›
